data.title: Quiet on Sunday
data.text:
Funky little place that is fun to hang out in.  Was here on a Sunday so the place was deserted. A friend and I hogged the big table for a good 90 minutes chatting.  Only us and two or three other customers (the other customers didn't linger, probably because we hogged the only good place to sit).  Not sure what the place is like during the weekday (busy, according to the cashier), but it worked for us.

Not sure if they ran out of validation or didn't validate, but we had to get a meal elsewhere to validate our parking for the lot.

data.title: Very original
data.text: Mood was awesome. Mix of coffee and books.  Free library,  take one leave one.  They also serve beer and wine. What's  not to like. Staff was very friendly.  If it wasn't  9am I'd have some wine

data.title: Must See Coffee Shop
data.text: This entire area has an amazing vibe. Perfect for relaxing by yourself or sitting down to talk for awhile. Great to walk up and down the street. Plus, excellent coffee and very friendly baristas - If traditional well made coffee isn't your thing, they have a delicious secret menu and amazing iced tea (Italian Blood Orange is my favorite). I don't want to give away all the ambiance details - but you can tell even as you walk up that thought and intention has gone into making this place comfortable and interesting for all types of travelers.

data.title: Great atmosphere..great coffee&pastries
data.text: Great past time atmosphere, the owner is smiling and welcoming you warmly. Books available outside to read. A place to go.

data.title: Great little coffee shop - smooth coffee and friendly baristas
data.text:
This is a new place however it's definitely a nice place to get coffee.  It serves Stumptown coffee which is very smooth - no burnt or bitter notes.  They also have Stumptown Cold Brew - a cold brewed coffee in a bottle, kept in the cooler - should be great in the summertime.
There's also a small selection of cookies and pastries.  The molasses cookie with ginger was good.
Not too much space to sit down inside, however there are chairs and tables outside and a deck area with chairs and tables also.
Great place to grab my morning latte.

data.title: Fantastic little coffee shop
data.text: I wish I lived on CA and wasn't just visiting. I'd get coffee here every day. The atmosphere is fantastic, staff is knowledgable, and the coffee was delicious. I had Hair Bender which wasn't nearly as strong as the name would have you believe.

data.title: おしゃれ
data.text: シックで大人の雰囲気を醸し出す店内で飲むコーヒーは格別です。一見大人向けのバーのような雰囲気で、店内の装飾も大人向けで、かなり落ち着いた感じです。コーヒーの味も上品で好きでした。

data.title: Dekorasi yang Unik
data.text: Memang tempat ini agak unik dekorasinya, seperti typewriter tua, buku di ceiling, mesin espresso classic dan banyak lagi, membuat nuansanya hip dan trendy. Kopinya lumayan enak, pastrynya juga boleh dicoba.
